评论详情: Overall loved this fit. The boob cups were the worst part. It's a very flattering cut with enough coverage for modesty but not so much that you feel overdressed. It's comfortable and made of good material, but the breast cups offered very little to no support, so I'll be replacing those.

评论概述: Vintage is the only wat to go for a Sissy man.
评论详情: This Sissy is loving the fit. I went with the reccomended size and it was spot on. The wider gusset lets me not have to worry about "Fallout".
This suit is cute until it gets wet, then I felt like an old lady wearing it because the front skirt like part hung too low. It was weird when wet.
Loved the fit, and got many compliments at the pool. Material quality is good, fits great, true to size, great stretchiness.
I found this swimsuit to be comfortable and super cute! The material is great quality.
Bought this for a cruise and it was great fun. Nice fit and feel.
Love the retro style and it actually looks good on (in my option☺)
This is my favorite swimsuit! I get so many compliments on it. Well made and flattering fit!

评论概述: Super cute. Fits as it should
评论详情: This is  a super cute suit that is both modest and flattering. I love it.
Very cute style but fit is for someone very short in torso. I can make it work, but have to have someone help me pull it up to good place on back.
This is so adorable. I wore it to a water park with the kids and it was a hit. It’s comfortable and so lightweight.

I loved the look of this bathing suit, but did not love the way I looked in this bathing suit. It was not flattering. It clung and drew attention to the wrong areas.  If you have a belly, FUPA, etc. that you'd rather hide than show off, this ain't the one for you.
So cute! It fits perfectly. Can't wait to show it off!
I’m a senior who is picky about how a suit fits and flatters. I was impressed how cute it is on. Fit great. Good coverage. A little thinner than my other suits so it dried quickly.
The first swimsuit arrived with the buttons broken. :’( But a quick matter of returning for a replacement and it was here before I knew it! I love love love this suit!!
I typically wear a size medium and couldn’t even squeeze this over my hips. Not very stretchy. Sad, it’s super cute.
Very cute! I love the fit. I'm 62 and it's just enough coverage and support, w/o showing too much.
Nice fun and comfortable fit
Does not fit true to size  - not very stretchy and the top was a little uncomfortable - I returned this item

评论概述: Nice,  just wish it had more tummy control!
评论详情: Very beautiful. Just wish it had better tummy control or hip control. I have large breast and it did not give me enough coverage. This would be an amazing bathing suit for a slender perfect body person.
Looks cute on

The suit I'd super cute. I bought it thinking the straps were white like the photo, but they are black. Buttons are white and so is bow but would look way cuter with the white straps as photographed.  But otherwise cute.

I have a rather larger chest and was worried ‘the girls’ would bounce out with any movement but per other reviews, they did indeed stay intact. My chest wasn’t flattened out either. With the design tie around the neck it pulls them together. I am 5’9”, 170lbs, 38DDD (post babies-so they are no longer firm.) I ordered both XL and a L. The XL gathered too much in waist and was too loose. I kept the large. Was not too tight at all around ‘the muffin.’ Great fit and I felt confident strutting around the pool area in public.

评论概述: Order up one size from what you usually wear.
评论详情: After reading the reviews I ordered up a size to be on the safe side. It fits very comfortably. Looks very stylish. Material feels  constructed well. Purchased for an impending trip so haven’t worn it in the pool yet so can’t comment on any fading. The cut is very attractive.

The product fit as expected.  I’m 5’3 165 with large breasts and the Large fit as expected.  The tie is a little short in my opinion though but it was not noticeable except at the beginning as it cut into my neck a little bit other than that it was perfect!
Like the fit of this suit.  It doesn’t creep up.
Love Love Love !!!
I loved the way it fit, I got lots of compliments 🎉I’m 5’1 and 114 pounds I got a small and it fit true to size

Love this swimsuit, however I wasn’t thrilled with the fit. It fit Perfectly through mid section but my boobs were coming out of it and the bottom sagged in the behind, for that reason I had to return it.

评论概述: Cute but not a great fit
评论详情: I like the design, but I wish they had more size options,  The smallest size was too big for me.  I took out a star because the front chest area is a bit off with the padding, so the fit isn't great.  The back side is shorter than the front.  I wish they would mirror the backside to match the skirted front side.  I still kept it because I had missed the return deadline before trying it on, so I'll try to make it work.  I think if I do a little sewing to customize the fit, I can make it work better for me.  Still a cute design, but I wouldn't purchase again.

评论概述: Super cute BUT Material is not great

Too cute and comfortable…
It literally took a month to.gwt but I do like the style.
I absolutely love this swimming suit. It fits really well and I get a lot of compliments when I wear it. Considering that I'm heavy, that makes me feel good.

评论概述: I love it it’s very comfortable
评论详情: I love it it’s very comfortable

This is the 2nd time I've purchased a swim suit from This brand and I love them both. The first one is now 5 years old and I still wear it some. There's starting to be a little dry rot in the elastic but otherwise it's in great shape. The new one is perfect. The only thing I don't like is that I feel like I need a strapless bra underneath but I feel that way with any bathing suit 90% of the time.  The first I purchased was a Large. At the time I was 5'5" 170. The most recent is an XL and I'm now 225 post-partum.
What a cute swimsuit! I’m 5’7” and 160 lbs. Large fit perfectly! Highly recommend this fun swimsuit!

I saw these posted in a mom fb group and when other reviewers with bodies like mine were confident enough to post pictures of themselves in a swimsuit in a review(looking fabulous), that was a huge endorsement. So flattering and confidence boosting for this middle aged mom bod! I wanted to show it off!

评论概述: Cute suit, ok quality, separate pieces
评论详情: The suit is probably flattering on people without a belly like I have, but this one made me look just terrible. Things to know: removable thin pads in chest area that slip around a lot, a separate piece for the front bow which you have to tie yourself, buttons are not super secure but not too bad. I had high hopes, since I wear a lot of suits this shape, but this one was just a no for me.

Bit disappointing. You will have to remove the front bow to make it modest. The picture on line is misleading. That model is flat chested. If you are not, just remove the red bow and you will be well covered. Top is a bit bulky that way, unfortunately. Buttocks and upper leg is covered.
This swimsuit is retro, but modern! So fun. Slimming and modest, but still feminine! I’m 5’7” and weigh 127. My only wish is that the neck ties were a bit longer. This suit is a keeper!

I've never ordered a bathing suit online before, but this one was a pleasant surprise. I'm 5'6, 108lbs and ordered a small, fits perfectly!! It's really stretchy and the fabric is extremely comfortable. It ties tight enough and I can easily loosen it. Came exactly as pictured and I can't wait to wear it to the beach!
So many compliments
Love this suit.  All the coverage with a little flash back in time.  Works great for the big busted ladies.  Its a wonderful purchase.  Worn twice with no signs of use. Would buy again.

评论概述: Stunning and a hit with the friends
评论详情: My wife looks so stunning in this! She loves the 50's pin up look and chose this swimsuit for that reason. It fits her so amazing and looks so cute. She loves the coverage especially the skirt bottom covering the bottom of the one piece. She loves the support for the girls too. The material is amazing too as it survived a water landing zip line ride! Amazing swimsuit 5 Stars 🌟 Perfect 10 recommendation.
Same as pictured. True to size. Perfect for our Fourth of July party.  5’1 and 180 got 2x

This suit did not fit at all like it was advertised. The top was too small, did not offer any support for the bust. There was no support around the waist, it felt and looked like I was wearing a barrel. I would not recommend this swimsuit to anyone.

评论概述: Keeps the Sin in and Accentuates the Sexy - Perfecto!
评论详情: This is amazing!!! I love this, I wish I had time to take a photo because its so flattering and gorgeous and its SEXY! It keeps all the sin in and accentuates the lovely bits. I ordered a medium. My height is 5'6 and Im 127lbs and 49 years old (so you get an idea of how my body is different than if I were 30) I am a pear shape as well with small boobs, and this swimsuit fits me like a dream!!! I would say it fits to size, but if unsure GO UP A SIZE. Im always a small on top and a medium on the bottom, so I just went with medium hoping the chest wouldnt be too big, and its not, its great. I will come back and by more from this seller. THANK YOU.
I sent this back because it just didn’t look good on me. With that being said…. It is well made and very cute

This is my second swim suit from this company, My last one wore out after 3 years of wearing. The style is so cute and received a lot of good comments on how cute it looks. I’m 70 years young and bought this new one for a up coming cruise to Hawaii so I’ll be looking pretty sharp with my matching red sunglasses. Buy this suit it’s cute, fun and looks good on.

This is such a great buy and every time I wear this swimsuit I get so many compliments. It’s very flattering

Super cute, true to size. I’m 5’1, 135 lbs, C cup and ordered a medium. Really liked it, would order again

Love this swimsuit. Great fit, very cute and flattering!  I really adore the retro look!! Also makes my stomach appear much flatter! Seems to be a quality swimsuit. I can't wait to wear it out.

I love this suit! Fit is great. I don’t think I’ve ever felt so comfortable in a bathing suit before.  Fabric doesn’t stretch out when it’s wet and the vintage style is great for my stocky figure. I will definitely buy this in another color!
This bathing suit is amazing and a huge hit! Got so many compliments on it and it felt like I could fit right into the 50s or 60s style. So comfortable and also flattering. 5 ⭐️

Obsessed!!! I LOVE the fit, the look, and the quality. I hit so many compliments and am definitely ordering more in different patterns. For reference, I am 5’2” and 126 lbs. I got a medium and it fit perfect.
I like the bathing suits
I absolutely love this suit!

评论概述: Unless you plan on standing like the model…it doesn’t work well!
评论详情: I ordered this suit in 2 sizes…one bigger than the first…and it was too big. The original size fit okay, but the blue color of the back, looked faded compared to the color of the front.Altho it fit, walking around in the suit was uncomfortable, and the back piece, partially elastic was loose and floppy, I returned both suits. So the quality, workmanship and fit of the suit is all a disappointment.

I am in love with this swimsuit ! I was looking for a retro bathing suit and I wore it to the beach in SC this last weekend while my family was celebrating my son’s Navy graduation. I am all about everything from decorating to wearing mid century style clothing and this was an amazing find on Amazon! I bought a medium. I am 5’3 and weigh 135lbs.
This suit fits well and looks so darn retro cute! Well made, too.

Firstly, product arrived days late but thankfully just in time for the reason I bought it.  when I ordered , I sized up, but I should have sized up again on top of that. I'm a chubby kid and I got a 3x and should have got a 4x ....when I normally wear 2x in everything else simply because I don't like tight clothes.  The product was as described and looks perfect!  I will be ordering the correct 4x size that I should have ordered, but the 3x will work for my party. I'll just feel very self conscious.

It is not high quality.  The 'tummy control'  is flimsy and does not do an effective job.  I had to spend another $20 on underwear to get the look I was expecting....the look that I get from suits ordered from Swim Suits for All.  Apparently, I need a LONG/TALL suit from this company.  I am barely 5'1". Other than that.  It is really cute and I have kept it.
i highly recommend this swimsuit, very flattering especially on thicker body types. very true to size as well!

This is for you if you like to be sexy but not over do it...hubby loved this on me when I came out to the pool with this bathing suit...I bought a size up to leave room for weight gain but I loved the way it got so comfortable and I have room to gain..plus it's still so sexy and vintage looking...covers back and booty cheeks...

I loved how I looked in this - as did my partner :) Paired it with some swim shorts and it was a great match :) I've lost over 200 pounds so it shaped my body perfectly, almost like super comfy shapewear
I ordered a size up as other reviews said it runs small and the fit is absolutely perfect, it looks great and feels very comfortable. I absolutely love it and will order again!
High quality, but overall I would not buy again. I would say that the size runs at least two sizes smaller than actual

I absolutely love the style of this. The polka dot to with the skort bottom is what drew me in. For this 50s style suit I expected more structure... Everywhere. The support cups are thin and fold up. I expected more runny control and structure through the waist too. So other than this being a really cute style, unfortunately it's not very well made.
It fit great,  and was made well. It's a very comfortable swimming suit.

I returned this immediately. The material is awful. I did not get the correct color. Although I definitely  don't look like the model, the suit was probably the single most unflattering thing I have ever tried on.

评论概述: Unattractive in person with construction issues
评论详情: I REEEAAAALLLY wanted to like this; it’s so adorable in the pictures!! When I tried it on the bust didn’t look right (I’m 36DD, the chest was weird for my size) and the buttons didn’t match the bodice fabric (red vs pink).  The biggest problem (and it’s BIG) is the inside seam around the top of the bodice. Not only does it project up, it’s substantial and is actually sewn to protrude straight out. It’s rough against the skin and rubs quite a bit just when trying it on, I can only imagine if it was wet!! I’m the daughter of a seamstress and have been sewing for 40 years, and I don’t see any way to fix this.  I gave it three stars because it might be cute with the buttons removed, but the construction was too poor to give it a higher rating.

I love everything about this swimsuit. It’s very comfortable, it’s slimming but not at all constricting. The boob support is great bc of the cups and you aren’t relying on the halter straps to keep everything up. Extremely happy with this product!

This bathing suit is not very flattering. It is much longer on me than it looks in the product photos. The neck straps are also not long enough to tie into a bow. I wanted a cute retro swimsuit, and this isn't it.
The fit was perfect, absolutely beautiful, 5" 3', 148 lbs and the large fit perfectly based on Amazon's recommendations. Would definitely be purchasing more.
The suit is cute but the back is thin.
I love the vintage style . some of the buttons look like they’re loose so they just need to be reinforced

This is the best thing I have purchased for myself in awhile. I love the look, the feel. It brought me that inner joy that sometimes is needed as a female (especially in a bathing suit). For reference, I’m 5’3 and 145ish depending on the day and I bought a large. Love it!!
The first time wearing it to the beach, I was given a compliment by another lady saying that my swimsuit was sooo cute.

I thought I would take a chance on this because bathing suits are notoriously smaller than you think they will be.  Well this one fit exactly as I hoped.  I really like it. It's comfortable and easy to get on and off.

评论概述: True to size and super cute!
评论详情: I bought an xl but I think I could have gone with a lg. It’s super comfortable and easy to wear. Very happy with this suit!

I’m 5’6” and 164 pounds and I bought a Large - this swimsuit is really cute. I have 5 kids and 8 grandkids so im always looking for something flattering and that fits my personality and this one fit the bill. The only negative and why I gave 4 stars I would say is it feels like it might not last a long time when it comes to durability of seams and quality of fabric. For the price and because I wanted it to go to the beach in June it’s worth it to me if it doesn’t last for years. I can always buy another next summer. I think it will last me for this summer.

评论概述: Small for the size it should have been.
评论详情: I ordered what should have been my size. A US 20 (3X). Couldn’t even pull it up. Too short as well. Returned.
Great quality and fit. Very conservative swimsuit, just like the 50's.
Could not wear it

This swimsuit is so adorable! I love it. It’s been on my wishlist for quite some time and I finally ordered it. I’m glad I did. I was a little worried that it wouldn’t look as good on me as it does on the model but once I tried it on I fell in love. The size guide said that it runs small and to size up so I went with a medium instead of a small. The fit is great in the chest but could be a little tighter in the body. It’s not loose in the body but would be nice if it were a little tighter. However, I think if I went with a small then it would have been too tight in the chest area and I’d be spilling out of it. Overall I love it! I love how it looks on me and I can’t wait to wear it this summer.
It's true to size I'm 5.5 n 167 got large. Very retro cute n looked sexy even with my curves. I have little stomach chunk n large breast.
I love it 😍

This is probably one of the softest most comfortable bathing suit I have ever bought. It does have a little stretch I normally wear a medium on bottom and small up top so I ordered a small and it fits really good.
